home.title: Triin Suurorg
home.description: Triin Suurorg is a highly experienced dental implantologist

about.title: Triin Suurorg | About me
about.description: Learn about my education and additional training. I have been dedicated to dental implantology for over 25 years.

hero.title: Peace begins with a smile
hero.description: The best result with the least invasive technique and the lowest cost. When restoring your teeth, my main goal is to achieve a natural result. The best dental result is one where what has been done is unnoticeable and feels like a natural part of your smile.

usp1.title: Holistic approach
usp1.description: I believe that dental health is a crucial part of overall health and has a significant impact on self-esteem. My mother, Teresa, once said: "Peace begins with a smile". In the dental process, I use the least amount of artificial materials and routine implantation followed by antibiotics.

usp2.title: Extensive experience
usp2.description: Since graduating from university in 1998, I have specialized in dental implants and other dental procedures. Over the past 15 years, I have only worked with implants and do not deal with other dental procedures. I have encountered many complex dental cases. Often, the entire dental implant was replaced.

usp3.title: Best tools
usp3.description: Since 2013, I have primarily worked with Swiss manufacturer Straumann implants. Straumann implants are made from high-quality titanium and zirconium alloy. SLActive implants are in a special liquid that accelerates their integration with the bone. You can find more information about Straumann implants by clicking here.

review1.text: Dr. Triin is precise, correct, compassionate, and trustworthy. She know her work and does it with immacualte concentration. She is very kind and gentle. It is pleasant to work with Dr. Triin as a patient. I recommend it to everyone.
review1.author: Jana

review2.text: Dr. Triin Suurorg is a great dentist! She took the time to explain all the procedures to me in a clear and concise manner. Her skillful work and compassionate approach made the entire experience much more enjoyable than I could have imagined. I am very satisfied with my dental implants and recommend her to everyone looking for a professional and friendly dentist.
review2.author: Katrin

review3.text: Thank you, Dr. Triin, for making my complex dental implant procedure smooth and painless! Her kind and confident approach gave me peace of mind throughout the process. The clinic is also very nice and friendly, making the dental visit even more enjoyable. Dr. Triin is truly a master in her field!
review3.author: Annabel

review4.text: Dr. Triin Suurorg is a professional and very dedicated to her work. She is always very kind and gentle. I always feel like I am in good hands. The dental implant procedure was a daunting thought for me, but Dr. Triin's skillful and reassuring approach eased all my concerns. The result is great and I am very satisfied! I highly recommend her!
review4.author: Kristjan
